assets.requestProjectCreationInfo: You can request the Organization that owns the Asset to create a Project with their Asset. Once you receive a notification it has been Approved you will be able to create a Project for this Asset.
assets.requestProjectCreationError: Project creation request not sent. If you have already made this request before, wait for the Organization that owns the Asset to approve. If you have not, contact our support for assistance.
assets.requestProjectCreationSuccess: Project creation request was sent successfully. You will receive notification once the Owner of the Asset approves the request.
assets.requestProjectCreationPermission: Request Permission to create a project for an asset of another organization
assets.clickOnMap: Click on the Map to select the Asset's Location *
assets.noCommunityOrganization: Asset has no Residents' Community registered yet
assets.noMapResultsFoundTooltip: Please check that the address is filled in correctly, or search an approximate location and pin the exact location manually. You could also try searching with more generic query and pin the exact location manually on the map after that.
assets.errorSearchingAddressNextStep: You can click on the exact location of your building on the map. When the marker icon appears you will be able to continue with the registration process. You will be asked to fill in all necessary details in the next step.
assets.errorLoadingAddressNextStep: If this is the correct location of your building you can continue with the registration process. You will be asked to fill in all necessary details in the next step.
assets.searchMapShortQuery: Please enter the exact address of the Asset.
assets.fillMapLocation: Please locate the Asset address on the map to continue to the next step.
assets.fillInData: Please fill in all required data to continue to the next step.

assets.assetUPDATESuccessInfo: All Asset's information has been updated successfully.
